title: 3 Beds 4 Baths Townhouse NICE SAFE Neighborhood
posting_body: ['Beautifully maintained townhome in a fantastic location.', 'Major freeway (59, 69, 610) access without even hitting a traffic light.', 'Very quiet community.', 'Walking distance from world class shopping center (The Galleria), enormous amount of entertainment surrounding the property (restaurants, health clubs, movie theatres, parks, etc.)', 'Memorial park is within 5 min drive.', 'It has biking trails, walking trails, picnic area, pool, playgrounds, volleyball, tennis, golf, lakes, etc.)', '12 min (9mi) drive to downtown Houston.', '15 min (7mi) drive to medical center area.', 'Home features:', '- extra high ceiling makes the place feel very spacious', '- lots of extra overhead storage in garage', '- marble countertops in kitchen and master bath', '- natural hardwood flooring on all 3 floors', '- reverse osmosis water filter system for drinking and cooking', '- large windows with lots of natural light', '- balcony', '- washer and dryer on same floor as master bedroom (3rd floor)', '- Wifi thermostat', '- gas cooktop', '- full bathroom in each bedroom', '1st floor: 2 car garage, 1 bedroom with full bathroom, patio area', '2nd floor: kitchen, dining area, living area, 1 half bath, balcony', '3rd floor: master bedroom, master bathroom, 2 closets in master, secondary bedroom with full bathroom, laundry area', 'There is a $40 non refundable application fee per person.', 'This covers credit and background check.', 'No history of eviction.', 'Renter should make at least 2X rent.', '12 months lease minimum.', 'Owner pays for garbage.', 'Owner responsible for normal wear and tear (AC, water heater).', 'Renter is responsible for water, sewer, electric, gas, yard maintenance which is extremely minor, other services (cable, internet).']
